testcase.name: TC_004_Joining the system by creating a new account with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici anasayfaya gider............................................passed Then Seller Join Now butonuna tiklar........................................passed And Vendor Type secer.......................................................passed And Sadece harflerden olusan bir company ismi girer.........................passed And 10 haneli numaralardan olusan company mobile girer......................passed And Company address girer...................................................passed And Sadece harflerden olusan full name girer................................passed And Invalid bir email address girer.........................................passed And Page Url oalcak bir subdomain adress girer..............................passed And 10 haneli numaralardan olusan mobile number girer.......................passed And Dropdowndan bir country secer...........................................passed And State name girer........................................................passed And City name girer.........................................................passed And Bir adres girer.........................................................passed And Postal Code girer.......................................................passed And Categories Dropdowndan bir category secer...............................passed And Seller Registrationa password girer.....................................passed And * ile isaretli zorunlu alanlarin dolu oldugunu dogrular.................passed And Registration Buttonunu tiklar...........................................passed And KayÄ±t isleminin yapilamadigini dogrular.................................passed
